sentences.english: Your anaerobic intervals should become incrementally longer and slower.
sentences.chinese: 您的無氧間歇跑應該延長時間和降低速度。

sentences.english: the exercises which occur without oxygen are called anaerobic.
sentences.chinese: 運動中不需要氧的就是無氧運動。

sentences.english: We independently developed the drum dryer to mention quality oxygen-free lignite.
sentences.chinese: 我們自主開發研製的滾筒式無氧褐煤提質乾燥機。

sentences.english: It was proved that the metabolism of conductive tissue is glycolytic.
sentences.chinese: 表明傳導組織是以無氧代謝爲其主要代謝途徑。

sentences.english: JAT OFC with Rhodium Plated Y type Speaker Terminal.
sentences.chinese: 一體成型無氧銅高純度鍍銠Y型喇叭端子。

sentences.english: When Hb reach the peak value, the curve of anaerobic limen moves left and there is an increase of aerobic ability.
sentences.chinese: 血紅蛋白高峯時，無氧閾曲線右移，有氧能力提高。

sentences.english: Fermentation must be done in anaerobic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 發酵作用一定要在無氧狀態下進行。

sentences.english: Oxygen-free conversion of methane was investigated by dielectric barrier discharge (DBD).
sentences.chinese: 用介質勢壘放電研究了甲烷在無氧條件下的直接轉化。

sentences.english: Creatine can add muscle growth anaerobic strength and explosive power.
sentences.chinese: 補充肌氨酸，可以增長肌肉無氧力量和爆發力。

sentences.english: Those levels increase further under the oxygen-deprived conditions typically found within obese fat tissue.
sentences.chinese: 這些水平肥胖者脂肪細胞在無氧條件下進一步升高。

sentences.english: Wind sprints are an anaerobic exercise.
sentences.chinese: 極速短跑是一種無氧運動。

sentences.english: Make an Approach to Production Technology of Highly Purified No- Oxygen Copper-Silver Alloy Slab- Strip Steel.
sentences.chinese: 高純無氧銅銀合金板帶材生產工藝的探討。

sentences.english: Training in football should lay emphasis on the development or the ability without oxygen as well that with oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 足球運動的訓練應注重發展運動員的無氧能力。

definition: (Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])
